site.title.help: Select the FVS Variant Location geometry which contains your project location. Your selected FVS Variant location will auto-populate helpful planting parameter defaults, including species mix, for you.

site.subheader_select_variant.help: An FVS "Variant" is a model calibrated for a particular geographic region. Variants are further subdivided into "Locations" which is typically a specific National Forest or district.

site.button_forward_to_planting.component: Continue button from Site Selection to Planting Scenario
site.button_forward_to_planting.help: Continue to the Planting Scenario calculations.

planting.title.help: Planting Parameter selections are fed into machine learning models trained to approximate FVS simulation outputs. Approximated FVS outputs are used to calculate Carbon Estimates and Project Financials.

planting.variant_label.component: Bold line showing the current FVS Variant above the planting sliders

planting.slider_survival.help: FVS does not directly predict the survival of seedlings and relies on the user to provide this information. Therefore 'Survival Percentage' can be either a best-guess value that reflects an expected outcome for a given location, or it can be used as another lever to explore the sensitivity of theoretical outcomes to various parameter values.

planting.slider_si.help: Site index (SI) is a widely-used forestry concept used to describe the inherent productivity of a site in a standardized frame of reference, i.e., the expected height of an average tree of a given species after a given number of years.

planting.species_mix_header.component: Header text above species TPA sliders
planting.species_mix_header.help: Set trees per acre (TPA) for each species.

planting.total_tpa_label.component: Computed Total TPA line under species sliders

planting.button_back_to_site.component: Back button from Planting Scenario to Site Selection

carbon.protocols_multiselect.component: Protocol selector for Carbon Units / Project Financials
carbon.protocols_multiselect.help: Select one or more protocols to estimate Carbon Units (CUs) and Project Financials.

credits.summary_subheader.help:
**Protocol:** The carbon accounting protocol / registry (ACR, CAR, VERRA, GS, or ISO) the financial results are based on.
**Total Net Revenue:** The total projected revenue from the project over its full crediting period, after deducting costs.
**NPV (Year 20) - Net Present Value at Year 20:** shows what the project’s 20-year returns are worth in today’s dollars.
**NPV per Acre:** Net Present Value (Year 20) on a per-acre basis.

credits.download_button.component: Download button for the full proforma CSV
credits.download_button.help: Download table used to calculate Project Financials.

credits.inputs.net_acres.help: The total area of land enrolled in the project, measured in acres.

credits.inputs.num_plots.help: The number of sampling plots established to monitor and measure forest growth/carbon.

credits.inputs.cost_per_cfi_plot.help: The cost of establishing and maintaining a single Continuous Forest Inventory plot.

credits.inputs.price_per_ert_initial.help: The assumed starting market price per carbon credit unit. This can be an ERT, VCU, or other unit depending on protocol.

credits.inputs.credit_price_increase.help: The assumed annual percentage increase in credit price over the project duration.

credits.inputs.registry_fees.help: Fees charged by the carbon registry annually for project registration and maintenance.

credits.inputs.validation_cost.help: One-time cost for the initial third-party validation of the project.

credits.inputs.verification_cost.help: Recurring cost for independent verification of carbon credits generated.

credits.inputs.issuance_fee_per_ert.help: The fee charged by the registry each time credits are issued, on a per-credit basis.

credits.inputs.anticipated_inflation.help: The assumed annual inflation rate applied to costs over time.

credits.inputs.discount_rate.help: The rate used in NPV calculations to account for the time value of money and investment risk.

credits.inputs.planting_cost.help: Upfront cost of planting, including site preparation and labor.

credits.inputs.seedling_cost.help: Upfront cost of purchasing seedlings used for planting.

toggle.inputs.acres.component: Toggle for either calculating per project or per acre.
toggle.inputs.acres.help: On: Per Project (Default), Off: Per Acre

number.inputs.acres.component: Number input for per project calculation.
number.inputs.acres.help: The total area of land enrolled in the project, measured in acres.
